resource.name: Statistics Canada Building Permit Survey Data - Section A
resource.description:
Building permit data for Statistics Canada Building Permit Survey (BDP) Section A: Major Construction Projects. Section A includes all residential permits which are for more than $50 000 or which result in the creation or demolition of a unit. This section also covers all non-residential permits of more than $250 000.

Data will only be made available for Municipalities that have signed an agreement to release their municipal permit data on datazONE.
columns_description: Date data was extracted for publication
Name of the municipal unit that issued the permit
Municipal identifier for the permit
Estimated value of the work covered by the permit
Total floor area of the building affected by the permitted work (in square feet)
Approval data entered on the permit (blank if no data)
Number of dwelling units lost as a result of the permitted work
Number of dwelling units created as a result of the permitted work
Identifies the type of building using the StatCan BDP Survey Work Type lookup list
Identifies the type of building using the StatCan BDP Survey Building Classification lookup list

domain_metadata.value: Open Data & Information Government Licence – PVSC & Participating Municipalities

resource.name: Statistics Canada Building Permit Survey Data - Section B
resource.description:
Building permit data for Statistics Canada Building Permit Survey (BDP) Section B: Minor Residential Additions and Renovations. Section B includes all permits for minor additions and renovations, that is, those of a value of less than $50 000.

Data will only be made available for Municipalities that have signed an agreement to release their municipal permit data on datazONE.
columns_description: Date data was extracted for publication
Describes the dwelling type (e.g. single vs. multiple) using types defined by StatCan BDP Survey Reporting Guide
Describes the structure type, using types defined by StatCan BDP Survey Reporting Guide
Provides a subtotal for the value of permits matching the specified structure and dwelling type
Name of the municipal unit
Provides the number of permits matching the specified structure and dwelling type

resource.name: CBRM_Buildings
resource.description:
The dataset contains the building footprints of all buildings in the CBRM as polygons. Along with the spatial information, the dataset also includes specific attributes of the buildings such as building description, class, and building name.
Attribute descriptions:
THE_GEOM: Building polygon geometry
CODE1: Identifies the building uses
CODE2: Identifies the building uses if more than 1
CODE3: Identifies the building uses if more than 2
CODE4: Identifies the building uses if more than 3
CODE5: Identifies the building uses if more than 4
CODE6: Identifies the building uses if more than 5
CODE7: Identifies the building uses if more than 6
CODE8: Identifies the building uses if more than 7
CODE9: Identifies the building uses if more than 8
CODE10: Identifies the building uses if more than 9
DESCRIP1: Description of building
DESCRIP2: Description of building if more than 1
DESCRIP3: Description of building if more than 2
NAME: Name of building if exists
GEN_CLASS: General class of building
GEN_CLASS2: Secondary general class of building
DB_UPDATED: Last date the attributes were updated
GR_UPDATED: Last date the geometry was updated

domain_metadata.value: Open Data & Information Government Licence – PVSC & Participating Municipalities

columns_description: Provides the number of permits matching the specified structure and dwelling type

Describes the type of activity covered by the permit using StatCan BDP Survey definitions
